A story about a dog that is afraid of loud noises but still manages to save its owner's life during a storm.
A children's book about a dog who discovers his courage by barking at a group of bullies.
A film about a deaf dog who learns sign language from its owner and becomes an interpreter for other deaf dogs.
A play about a dog who dreams of being a superhero and uses its bark to create superpowers.
A podcast series about a dog who travels the world, encountering new people and experiences, and learning about different cultures through its senses of smell and hearing.
